name: 升级打怪换装备
description:
A little game made by rouglelike fans [/]

This is a rouglelike like game that can freely match character skills, talents and attribute points

At the same time, there is also a nurturing system in the game. Through many explorations, you can accumulate powerful skills, talents and unlock new characters

This game is a real-time combat game, which releases different skills by accumulating Yin and yang energy

As the exploration progresses, more maps and enemies will be unlocked

Different enemies will have different skills and passive talents. Players can equip specific skills and talents to resist different monsters

After completing your achievements, you will get stardust. By offering stardust to the cat God, you can improve the probability of high-quality blessings

Each character has its own special passive talent and two skills

By matching runes and weapons, you can increase your combat power exponentially to defeat the enemy
